Key Match Events: England won by 10 wickets and with 24 balls to spare
Buttler (80) and Hales (86) chased down 169 in style - England hit 10 sixes
Late hitting from Hardik (63 off 33) propels India to 168-6
Kohli anchors India with 50 off 40 balls
India slipped to 75-3 after losing Rohit and Suryakumar in quick succession
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted the final would be between England and Pakistan
Alex Hartley mentioned Pakistan's pace attack and spinners as strengths
Post-Match Reflections: Martin Tooth praised England's performance, comparing it to their 2019 peak
Ravi Bopara said it would be worrying for the Pakistan bowlers to see England's performance
Alex Hartley mentioned that England are setting the bar and trend for T20 cricket
Miscellaneous Highlights: The final awaits between England and Pakistan in Melbourne on Sunday
There is a reserve day for the final, but that might mean the early hours of Monday morning in the UK
The weather forecast in Melbourne for the weekend was mentioned as a concern
Ravi Bopara mentioned that England were fantastic and setting the bar for T20 cricket
